properties.description:
Will always be loaded as full.

- For full load use:
Parameter tables = 
["{
'schema':'BD_BASI',
'table':'tb_colaborador',
'load_type':'full',
'partition_column':'null',
'columns':' * ',
'raw': 
{'partition_by': [
{'col_name': 'YEAR','implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'YEAR\\',functions.year(functions.col(\\'dt_atualizacao\\')))'},
{'col_name': 'MONTH','implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'MONTH\\',functions.month(functions.col(\\'dt_atualizacao\\')))'},
{'col_name': 'DAY','implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'DAY\\',functions.dayofmonth(functions.col(\\'dt_atualizacao\\')))'}
]}}"]

Execute pipeline = template_import_table_incremental

As this object is really small, you can add: 'raw':{'coalesce': 1}

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables
